about_the_game:
This DLC contains the following:
- Access to a special chat and a role in the discord
- Your Steam nickname will be added to the credits
- Instead of the standard icon, everyone will see the icon of your Steam profile
- You will have a special pawn on the field

By purchasing this DLC, you are helping us to continue the active development of our next projects.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains the following:
- Access to a special chat and a role in the discord
- Your Steam nickname will be added to the credits
- Instead of the standard icon, everyone will see the icon of your Steam profile
- You will have a special pawn on the field

By purchasing this DLC, you are helping us to continue the active development of our next projects.
name: Cosmopoly - Associate's DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 2400
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX680
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: By purchasing this DLC, you are helping us to continue the active development of our next projects.
